text: I thought you were my friend.
Shut up!  Don't lie to me.
Is it really time for that?
This place is dangerous, you shouldn't be here.
What are you doing out here?
Was that noises?  I think I heard noises.
I saw something up ahead.  I promise this time.
The trees are talking behind your back.
And thus we live to struggle another day.
Any man, no matter how hard, can bear his burdens for one day.
Did you sleep well last night?  And the night before that?  I was with you from the very beginning.
Hey, I need to kill that %1$s!
I want to watch that %1$s bleed!
That %1$s looked at you funny.  Kill it.  Now.
That %1$s seems to be smiling at you.  Go say hi for me.
Shouldn't you put a bandage on that?
Please don't die!  No one else lets me kill things!
You look hurt, did I do that?
Are you supposed to be bleeding?
You're not going to die, are you?
Kill a few more before you bleed out!
Let me have a taste of your blood.
Thrust me deeper into the wound.  You know that this is the only way out right?
You can put me back together, right?
I… I can't move my legs!
I can still fight, don't replace me!
Why have you treated me like you treated your self?
This is the end; the bitter, bitter end.
Do you think it will rain today?
How many do you think we've killed?
It's time to let me go.

You feel in full control of the situation.
You attained perfection a long time ago.  This world is but a mirage of your own making.  Thus, this is a perfect world.

"RUN.  NOW.  IT MAY NOT BE TOO LATE."
An electric shock shoots into your hand from %1$s!
